section.p: "Contains the identifier of the medical substance/treatment administered.... If the substance administered is a vaccine, CVX codes may be used to code this field...." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-5

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] cvx with data type CD
"Contains the identifier of the medical substance/treatment administered.... If the substance administered is a vaccine, CVX codes may be used to code this field...." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-5
Contains exactly one [1..1] productInstance, where its type is Packaged Medicinal Product
Contains zero or more [0..*] indication, where its type is Indication

Contains zero or one [0..1] administeredBarcodeId with data type Id
"This field contains the pharmacy system's assigned barcode number for the give occurrence. For IV orders, many pharmacy systems generate a barcode number to identify a specific bag/bottle of the order. This number can be an instance identifier; unique for the patient, drug combination, and schedule instance or it may be just a drug identifier." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-25

Contains zero or more [0..*] administrationTagId with data type Id
"Contains an identifier for the individual product instance for the dispense occurrence. This may represent a barcode, RFID or other means of automatically-readable product instance. Repetitions represent the same instance where more than one barcode, RFID or other identification is present." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-29

Contains exactly one [1..1] cvx with data type CD
"Contains the identifier of the medical substance/treatment administered.... If the substance administered is a vaccine, CVX codes may be used to code this field...." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-5
Contains zero or one [0..1] medicinalProductInstance, where its type is Medicinal Product Instance
Contains zero or one [0..1] pharmacyManufacturedProduct, where its type is Pharmacy Manufactured Product
Contains exactly one [1..1] productInstance, where its type is Packaged Medicinal Product
Contains zero or more [0..*] indication, where its type is Indication
